alert.note: Alert for Tooele (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 06 at 2:44PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northern Utah, including the following county, Tooele. * WHEN...Until 445 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 243 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1.25 inches of rain have fallen in a short amount of time. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tooele, Grantsville, Stansbury Park, Tooele Army Depot, Erda and Lake Point.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
